trans-unit.source: This class represents a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen representerer en ekstern datamaskin.

trans-unit.source: The purpose of the abstract Peer class is to provide a common base class definition that can be shared by derived classes such as <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.
trans-unit.target: Formålet med abstract node klassen er å angi en vanlig basisklassen-definisjon som kan deles av avledede klasser som <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>

trans-unit.source: It cannot be directly constructed, since it is abstract.
trans-unit.target: Det kan ikke direkte konstrueres, fordi den er abstrakt.

trans-unit.source: Developers should use the subclasses PeerNearMe or PeerContact instead.
trans-unit.target: Utviklere kan bruke underklasser PeerNearMe eller PeerContact i stedet.

trans-unit.source: Contact, peer, remote peer, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.LocalContact%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> are synonymous terms, based on context.
trans-unit.target: Kontakt node, eksterne datamaskinen <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>, <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.LocalContact%2A>, og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>er samme vilkårene, basert på kontekst.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager.LocalContact%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>

trans-unit.source: "Calling peer" and "remote peer" are commonly synonymous.
trans-unit.target: "Kaller node" og "eksterne node" er vanligvis samme.

trans-unit.source: Calling peer does not refer to the application calling a given method.
trans-unit.target: Kall node refererer ikke til programmet kaller en metode som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> type.

trans-unit.source: Returns a type <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> object, subclassed on <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> or <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer et av typen <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>objekt, en underklasse på <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>eller <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: The PeerContact <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A> or the PeerNearMe <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.Nickname%2A> contain unique references to the name of the new peer object.
trans-unit.target: PeerContact <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>eller PeerNearMe <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.Nickname%2A>inneholde unike referanser til navnet på det nye node-objektet.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.Nickname%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Reference to the object that holds the data needed to deserialize this instance.
trans-unit.target: Referanse til objektet som inneholder data som kreves for å deserialisere denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Context that provides the means for deserializing the data.
trans-unit.target: Sammenheng som lar deserialisering av dataene.

trans-unit.source: Also referred to as the source of the serialized data.
trans-unit.target: Kalles også kilden for de serialiserte dataene.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Frigir alle ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> object and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Frigir uforvaltede ressursene som brukes av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> objekt og eventuelt frigir administrerte ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: Satt til <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> å frigjøre både administrerte og uforvaltede ressurser. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> frigi bare uforvaltede ressurser.

trans-unit.source: Performs a case-sensitive comparison of the current <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> and the specified peer.
trans-unit.target: Utfører en skiller sammenligning av gjeldende <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> og den angitte datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: Two peers are considered equal if they have the same endpoint collection, regardless of the values in their <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: To motpartene regnes lik hvis de har samme endpoint samlingen, uavhengig av verdiene i sin <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Usage scenarios do not involve this class directly, but rather the derived <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> or the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> classes.
trans-unit.target: Bruksscenarier ikke inneholder denne klassen direkte, men heller avledede <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>eller <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>klasser.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> instance to compare to this instance.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> forekomst til å sammenligne for denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the supplied <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> instance has the same <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.PeerEndPoints*> as this peer instance, otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> hvis den angitte <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> forekomsten har samme <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.PeerEndPoints*>som denne node-forekomsten, ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.PeerEndPoints*>

trans-unit.source: This method also returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the peer parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer også <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> Hvis parameteren node <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the data needed to serialize the target <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objekt med dataene som kreves for å serialisere målet <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: The destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: Målet for denne serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of data objects from a local cache.
trans-unit.target: Henter objektsamlingen data fra en lokal hurtigbuffer.

trans-unit.source: This functionality is only exposed on the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonaliteten er bare eksponert på <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>klasse.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: This functionality is not exposed on any other type of peer for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonaliteten er ikke eksponert på andre typer node av sikkerhetsgrunner.

trans-unit.source: If the peer collaboration session did not instantiate with a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, this method cannot access objects on the local computer.
trans-unit.target: Hvis node samarbeidsøkten ikke starte med en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>, denne metoden kan ikke få tilgang til objekter i den lokale datamaskinen.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The same is true of the applications registered into the collaboration session.
trans-unit.target: Det er av programmene som er registrert i samarbeid-økt.

trans-unit.source: The collection of peer objects consists of application, data object, and presence information for the peer or endpoint specified by this instance.
trans-unit.target: Objektsamlingen node som består av programmet, dataobjektet og tilgjengelighetsinformasjon for node eller endepunkt som er angitt i denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: If no objects are found for the endpoint, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen objekter for sluttpunktet, en samling med størrelsen null (0), returneres.

trans-unit.source: If the calling peer is subscribed to this endpoint, the cache is automatically updated; otherwise <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A> must be called prior to calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis kall motparten som abonnerer på dette endepunktet, oppdateres automatisk hurtigbufferen; Ellers <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A>må kalles før du kaller denne metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to be signed into the collaboration infrastructure for this method to complete successfully.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren er ikke må være logget på samarbeid infrastrukturen for denne metoden skal fullføres.

trans-unit.source: A successful call to <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A> or one of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> methods must have been completed while the caller was signed in previous to calling this method.
trans-unit.target: En vellykket kall til <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A>eller en av de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>metoder må ha fullført mens Oppkalleren ble logget på forrige for å kalle denne metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A>

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Additional overloads are defined on the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> class instead of the subclasses <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>.
trans-unit.target: Merk: Flere overbelastninger er definert for <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>klassen i stedet for underklasser <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> collection for the peer or endpoint specified by this instance.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> samling for node eller endepunkt som er angitt i denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not subscribed to the endpoint or has not yet called <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData*>.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren som ikke abonnerer på sluttpunktet eller har ikke kalt <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData*>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData*>

trans-unit.source: The method is unable to complete due to an error in the underlying Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Metoden er ikke fullført på grunn av en feil i den underliggende node-samarbeid infrastrukturen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> object associated with the supplied <xref:System.Guid> from the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObjectCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> tilknyttet det angitte <xref:System.Guid>fra den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObjectCollection"> </xref>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: This functionality is only exposed on the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonaliteten er bare eksponert på <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>klasse.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>

trans-unit.source: This functionality is not exposed on any other type of peer for security reasons.
trans-unit.target: Denne funksjonaliteten er ikke eksponert på andre typer node av sikkerhetsgrunner.

trans-unit.source: The collection of peer objects consists of application, data object, and presence information for the peer or endpoint specified by this instance.
trans-unit.target: Objektsamlingen node som består av programmet, dataobjektet og tilgjengelighetsinformasjon for node eller endepunkt som er angitt i denne forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: If no objects are found for the endpoint, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det finnes ingen objekter for sluttpunktet, en samling med størrelsen null (0), returneres.

trans-unit.source: When the calling peer is subscribed to this endpoint, the cache is automatically updated; otherwise <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A> must be called prior to calling this method.
trans-unit.target: Når kall motparten som abonnerer på dette endepunktet, oppdateres automatisk hurtigbufferen; Ellers <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A>må kalles før du kaller denne metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A>

trans-unit.source: The caller is not required to be signed into the collaboration infrastructure for this method to complete successfully.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren er ikke må være logget på samarbeid infrastrukturen for denne metoden skal fullføres.

trans-unit.source: A successful call to <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A> or one of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> methods must have been completed while the caller was signed in previous to calling this method.
trans-unit.target: En vellykket kall til <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A>eller en av de <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>metoder må ha fullført mens Oppkalleren ble logget på forrige for å kalle denne metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData%2A>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når samarbeidsøkten starter.

trans-unit.source: NOTE: Additional overloads are defined on the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer> class instead of the derived classes <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>.
trans-unit.target: Merk: Flere overbelastninger er definert for <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>klassen i stedet for avledede klasser <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact>og <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> object to be retrieved from the collection
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Guid>av den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> objektet som skal hentes fra samlingen</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> object associated with the supplied <xref:System.Guid>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref>objektet som er knyttet til den angitte <xref:System.Guid>.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: If an object is not found, a collection of size zero (0) is returned.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det ikke finnes et objekt, en samling med størrelsen null (0), returneres.

trans-unit.source: The object ID is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Objekt-IDen er <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The caller is not subscribed to the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> or has not yet called <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData*> against it.
trans-unit.target: Oppkalleren er ikke abonnerer på den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> eller ennå ikke kalt <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData*>mot det.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerNearMe.RefreshData*>

trans-unit.source: An error occurred when getting object information from the peer.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under henting av objektinformasjon fra motparten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the available presence information for a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den tilgjengelige tilgjengelighetsinformasjon for en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Presence information includes status descriptors such as online, offline, and away.
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengelighetsinformasjon inneholder status beskrivelser som online, frakoblet og plassering.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"></xref> for which to retrieve presence information.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint"> </xref> som du vil hente tilgjengelighetsinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"></xref> object which contains presence information for an available endpoint if it is available; otherwise it is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerPresenceInfo"> </xref> objekt som inneholder tilgjengelighetsinformasjon for et tilgjengelig sluttpunkt hvis den er tilgjengelig; ellers er det <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: peerEndPoint does not contain a valid endpoint.
trans-unit.target: peerEndPointinneholder ikke et gyldig endepunkt.

trans-unit.source: peerEndPoint is .
trans-unit.target: peerEndPointis .

trans-unit.source: This object has been disposed and cannot be used in current peer operations.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet har blitt fjernet, og kan ikke brukes i gjeldende node-operasjoner.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred while retrieving presence information from the peer.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under henting av tilgjengelighetsinformasjon fra motparten.

trans-unit.source: Sends an invitation to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> to start a specific <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sender en invitasjon til en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> å starte en bestemt <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the Peer Collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når økten node-samarbeid starter.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref> from the peer that received the invitation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"> </xref> fra motparten fikk invitasjonen.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during the invitation process.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under prosessen invitasjonen.

trans-unit.source: - The currently executing application is not registered with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: -Øyeblikket kjøres programmet er ikke registrert med node-samarbeid infrastrukturen.

trans-unit.source: Sends an invitation to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> to start a specific <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sender en invitasjon til en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> å starte en bestemt <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the peer collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når økten node samarbeid starter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> for which the invitation is sent.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> for invitasjonen er sendt.

trans-unit.source: A message to send to the remote peer along with the application invitation.
trans-unit.target: En melding som skal sendes til den eksterne datamaskinen sammen med programmet invitasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The message can be no more than 255 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen kan inneholde mer enn 255 Unicode-tegn.

trans-unit.source: A user defined data blob to associate with the invitation.
trans-unit.target: En brukerdefinert data blob å knytte til invitasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Its size can be no more than 16,384 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen kan være større enn 16 384 byte.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref> from the peer that received the invitation.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"> </xref> fra motparten fikk invitasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The application is not registered for collaboration.
trans-unit.target: Programmet er ikke registrert for samarbeid.

trans-unit.source: invitationData is larger than 16,384 bytes.
trans-unit.target: invitationDataer større enn 16 384 byte.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during the invitation process.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under prosessen invitasjonen.

trans-unit.source: - The currently executing application is not registered with the peer collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: -Øyeblikket kjøres programmet er ikke registrert med node samarbeid infrastrukturen.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous invitation operation which sends an invitation to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> to start a specific <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron invitasjonen operasjon som sender en invitasjon til en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> å starte en bestemt <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the peer collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når økten node samarbeid starter.

trans-unit.source: User-defined object to pass to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinert objekt skal sendes til tilbakeringing for den asynkrone operasjonen til å identifisere.

trans-unit.source: This required parameter must be unique across all asynchronous invitation operations in progress.
trans-unit.target: Dette kreves parameteren må være unik for alle asynkrone invitasjonen operasjoner pågår.

trans-unit.source: userToken is
trans-unit.target: userTokener

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during the invitation process.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under prosessen invitasjonen.

trans-unit.source: - The currently executing application is not registered with the collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: -Øyeblikket kjøres programmet er ikke registrert med samarbeid infrastrukturen.

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous invitation operation which sends an invitation to a <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> to start a specific <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Starter en asynkron invitasjonen operasjon som sender en invitasjon til en <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> å starte en bestemt <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: This state is created when the peer collaboration session begins.
trans-unit.target: Denne tilstanden opprettes når økten node samarbeid starter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"></xref> for which the invitation is sent.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication"> </xref> for invitasjonen er sendt.

trans-unit.source: A message to send to the remote peer along with the application invitation.
trans-unit.target: En melding som skal sendes til den eksterne datamaskinen sammen med programmet invitasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The maximum size of this message is 255 Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: Den maksimale størrelsen på denne meldingen er 255 Unicode-tegn.

trans-unit.source: A user defined data blob to associate with the invitation.
trans-unit.target: En brukerdefinert data blob å knytte til invitasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Its size can be no more than 16,384 bytes.
trans-unit.target: Størrelsen kan være større enn 16 384 byte.

trans-unit.source: User-defined object to pass to the callback of the asynchronous operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinert objekt skal sendes til tilbakeringing for den asynkrone operasjonen til å identifisere.

trans-unit.source: This required parameter must be unique across all asynchronous invitation operations in progress.
trans-unit.target: Dette kreves parameteren må være unik for alle asynkrone invitasjonen operasjoner pågår.

trans-unit.source: The application is not registered with the collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: Programmet er ikke registrert med samarbeid infrastrukturen.

trans-unit.source: userToken is
trans-unit.target: userTokener

trans-unit.source: invitationData is larger than 16,384 bytes.
trans-unit.target: invitationDataer større enn 16 384 byte.

trans-unit.source: An error occurred during the invitation process.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod en feil under prosessen invitasjonen.

trans-unit.source: - The currently executing application is not registered with the collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: -Øyeblikket kjøres programmet er ikke registrert med samarbeid infrastrukturen.

trans-unit.source: Cancels the invitation that was sent with the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteAsync*> method.
trans-unit.target: Avbryter invitasjonen som ble sendt med den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteAsync*>metoden.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteAsync*>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method guarantees the system will cease to wait for a <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse> from the peer associated with the InviteAsync request.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden garanterer systemet vil slutte å vente på en <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse>fra motparten tilknyttet InviteAsync forespørselen.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse>

trans-unit.source: Multiple invitations may be outstanding at any given time.
trans-unit.target: Flere invitasjoner kan være utestående om gangen.

trans-unit.source: If the InviteAsyncCancel method is called when an asynchronous operation identified by the `userToken` is not in existence, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis metoden InviteAsyncCancel kalles når en asynkron operasjon ble identifisert av den `userToken` er ikke i forekomsten, et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The `userToken` object must be provided since it is used to track a specific asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: Den `userToken` objekt må angis fordi den brukes til å finne et bestemt asynkrone kall.

trans-unit.source: This host application-supplied object is unique for each invite request.
trans-unit.target: Vert Programdefinert objektet er unik for hver forespørsel om invitasjonen.

trans-unit.source: When this method is used, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteCompleted> event can still be raised, but the Cancelled property on the associated <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.InviteCompletedEventArgs> object will be set to `true.` Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metoden brukes, den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteCompleted>hendelsen kan fremdeles være opp, men egenskapen avbrutt for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.InviteCompletedEventArgs>objektet settes til `true.` kalle denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.InviteCompletedEventArgs> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteCompleted>

trans-unit.source: User defined object to pass to the callback of the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteAsync*> operation for identification.
trans-unit.target: Brukerdefinerte objektet som sendes til tilbakeringing for den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteAsync*>operasjonen for identifikasjon.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteAsync*>

trans-unit.source: This required parameter must be unique across all asynchronous invitation operations in progress.
trans-unit.target: Dette kreves parameteren må være unik for alle asynkrone invitasjonen operasjoner pågår.

trans-unit.source: The userToken parameter cannot be
trans-unit.target: Den userToken parameteren kan ikke være

trans-unit.source: An asynchronous invitation is not outstanding.
trans-unit.target: En asynkron invitasjon er utestående.

trans-unit.source: Raised when the invitation process for a remote peer has completed.
trans-unit.target: Starter når invitasjonen prosessen for en ekstern datamaskin er fullført.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse> specifies the result of the invitation operation.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse>angir resultatet av operasjonen invitasjonen.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse>

trans-unit.source: Calling this method requires a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> of <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.
trans-unit.target: Kaller denne metoden krever en <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>av <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Dette <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value specifying if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> is currently 'online'.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> er for øyeblikket er tilkoblet.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> is online at any of the endpoints associated with it; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> hvis den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> er på noen av endepunkt som er tilknyttet; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Unless specified, the default value for this property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis angitt, er standardverdien for denne egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from this class can override this method to perform additional tasks when the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteCompleted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra denne klassen kan overstyre denne metoden for å utføre flere aktiviteter når den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteCompleted>denne hendelsen oppstår.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteCompleted>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"></xref> object containing the event data to be passed to delegates associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteCompleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerInvitationResponse"> </xref> objektet som inneholder Hendelsesdata som skal sendes til representant som er knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer.InviteCompleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When a remote peer is an intermediary for a host peer, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint> objects contained in <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection> associate with the local contacts for the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: Når en eksterne datamaskinen er en mellomledd for en vert-node i <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>objekter i <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection>knyttet til de lokale kontaktene for den eksterne datamaskinen.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection> </xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPointCollection"> </xref> knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref> object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref> objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapsverdien er angitt, må alle hendelser starter ikke som et resultat av en asynkron operasjon tilknyttede hendelsesbehandlingen kalt tilbake på tråd som opprettet bestemte <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerEndPoint.SynchronizingObject*>

trans-unit.source: The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread.
trans-unit.target: Angi verdien for denne egenskapen er `null`, som angir at alle hendelsesbehandling kalles på en system tråd applikasjonsutvalget tråd.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically set to a UI element such as a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> instance.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er vanligvis satt til en UI-elementet som en <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>forekomsten.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: Object that implements the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"></xref> interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som implementerer den <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke"> </xref> grensesnittet og brukes av forekomster av denne typen for hendelsen behandlingsprogrammet synkronisering på tråd som opprettet det..

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: Kall objektet har blitt fjernet.

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> class instance with the data required to serialize the specified <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Fyller ut en <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> klasseforekomsten med data som kreves for å serialisere den angitte <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject"> </xref> forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A derived type must call the base type <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*> method.
trans-unit.target: En avledet type må kalle basistypen <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>metode.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> til å fylle ut med data.

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: Målet for serialisering.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> representing the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*> associated with the <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer en <xref:System.String>som representerer den <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>knyttet til den <xref href="System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.Peer"> </xref>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> representing the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>som representerer <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*>.</xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.PeerName*></xref:System.String>
